response.answer_text: Hii Milan…!! Actually it's a little bit tough to answer your question as you haven't mentioned for any specific country …But let's get to the most favoured countries by students.i.e Germany,U.S.A,Canada and Australia ….those countries are the most popular destinations for Indian students …..So let's start … For Germany you could visit the official website of DAAD ..it's their government website which handles all the students scholarships and all that kind of stuff ….You could visit over here … Deutscher Akademischer Austauschdienst As far as USA is concerned the USA government provides 2 full scholarship 1) Foreign fullbright scholarships ..check out the link for further details(eligibility,process,etc) USA Fulbright Scholarships for International Students 2) Humphrey fellowship..check the link given below for further details(eligibility,process,etc) Hubert Humphrey Fellowships in USA for International Students But the above two mentioned are for the students opting for masters or PhD In Canada you can get tons of options even if you simply Google it Some of the most interesting are 19 Scholarships in Canada | Admission Table – Your Study Overseas Counselor For scholarships in Australia they have a little common system as Germany ..you could visit their government page .Link provided below Scholarships to study in Australia Hope you get the the answer that you expected …. And sorry if I did any mistakes in my answer ..!! Btw Merry Christmas …!!
